entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Local blowing snow early this afternoon. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
